# "Unshakeable Faith"
## Scripture
"Whoever dwells in the shelter of the Most High will rest in the shadow of the Almighty." â€“ Psalm 91:1
## Reflection
As warriors of Christ, we often face uncertainty and turmoil. But today's verse reminds us that we can find peace and rest in the presence of the Almighty. The psalmist is not talking about a temporary haven or a fleeting sense of calm, but a deep, abiding faith that can withstand any storm. This is what it means to dwell in the shelter of the Most High. It's a posture of trust, not a feeling of comfort. When the world around us seems to be falling apart, we can anchor our hearts in the unshakeable faith that God is our Rock and our Refuge. So let's choose to dwell in His presence today, even when our circumstances seem impossible.

## Daily Challenge
"Take 5 minutes to write down areas of your life where you feel uncertain or fearful. Then, pray and ask God to reveal His presence and peace in those areas, declaring that He is your Rock and Refuge."
